headline: Coinbase Joins S&P 500 As Bitcoin Eyes Trump Election Highs: Is Coin Stock A Buy Now?
summary: Coinbase joined the S&P 500 on Monday.  Shares leaped 24% last week after news it would be the first cryptocurrency exchange to join the benchmark index and cleared a resistance level.  Also, Coinbase's relative strength line has spiked up.

raw.headline: Coinbase Joins S&P 500 As Bitcoin Eyes Trump Election Highs: Is Coin Stock A Buy Now?
raw.summary: Coinbase joined the S&P 500 on Monday.  Shares leaped 24% last week after news it would be the first cryptocurrency exchange to join the benchmark index and cleared a resistance level.  Also, Coinbase's relative strength line has spiked up.

headline: Cryptocurrencies Are Going Mainstream, On Wall Street And In Washington
summary: Bitcoin and crypto are becoming increasingly integrated into Wall Street and Washington. Pro-crypto policies are in favor, but volatility and consumer protections remain concerns.
